dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: Ah darn, I lost the thief... At this rate I'm never getting that crown back!

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: Huh? Who just agreed with me?

dialogue.name: Charlotte
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: It was me, Charlotte the great! And that crown is gonna be mine!

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: What? No fair! I had it first! Finder's keeper!

dialogue.name: Charlotte
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: You don't have the right to claim that crown if you lost it so easily! I'd me a much more responsible owner!
Now then! I'll just make sure you stay outta my way!
